custom-action.name: minerstart
custom-action.description:
Enable/Disable the mining .
Possible parameters are: - WhiteBlocMasterHost (required): Master Node of your Whiteblock Network Default value is "Host of the master Node ". - WhiteBlocRpcPort (required): RPC port of the whiteblock node Default value is "RPC port of the whiteblock node". - WhiteBlocRpctoken (required): RPC token of the whiteblock node Default value is "RPC token of the whiteblock node". - ProxyName (optional): name of the neoload proxy Default value is "name of the neoload proxy". - MinerMode (required): value possible :ON to enable, OFF to disable Default value is "mode of the miner process". - TraceMode (optional): enable loggin details : true: enable ; false : Disable Default value is "enable logging ".
